prompt: Generate diverse and realistic customer feedback text that expresses negative sentiment. The feedback should convey dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment with a product, service, or experience. Include a wide range of contexts such as online shopping, restaurant visits, customer support interactions, app usage, travel experiences, or subscription services. Use varied tones (e.g., angry, sarcastic, disappointed, formal, passive-aggressive) and lengths (from short complaints to detailed critical reviews). Incorporate different perspectives, such as feedback from younger or older customers, or from different cultural backgrounds. Include subtle or nuanced negativity (e.g., mild frustration or polite criticism) alongside strong complaints. Examples could include criticism of poor quality, delays, unhelpful staff, technical issues, misleading advertising, or unpleasant experiences.
response:
I ordered a dress online but received the wrong size. It’s frustrating to deal with this kind of mistake.  
The service at the restaurant was terrible, and the food was cold. I won’t be coming back.  
I downloaded the app, but it crashes every time I try to open it. What a waste of time.  
I was promised a two-day shipping but it’s been over a week. This is unacceptable.  
The flight was delayed for hours, and nobody gave us updates. I’m extremely disappointed.  
I expected better quality for the price I paid. The product feels cheap and flimsy.  
The customer support team was unhelpful and rude when I called. I feel ignored.  
I received my subscription box, and half of the items were damaged. This is so disappointing.  
I tried to return a faulty item, but the process was complicated and frustrating.  
The website was misleading about the product features. I feel cheated.  
I had high hopes for this restaurant, but the service was slow, and the food was bland.  
I encountered multiple bugs in the software. It’s practically unusable at this point.  
I feel like the staff at this store doesn’t care about customers. It’s a disappointing experience.  
The hotel promised amenities that were not available. This was a huge letdown.  
I ordered a coffee, and it was lukewarm when I got it. Not what I expected.  
I signed up for a premium plan, but the benefits are underwhelming. I feel misled.  
The tour guide was disengaged and didn’t seem to know much about the sights.  
I was charged for items I never received. This is unacceptable and frustrating.  
The waiting time for customer service was outrageous. I will think twice before contacting again.  
I had a terrible experience with the rental car; it was dirty and not well-maintained.  
The food was overpriced and tasteless. I wish I had chosen somewhere else.  
I had a disappointing experience with the online class; the material was poorly organized.  
I was excited about the concert, but the sound quality was awful. What a letdown.  
The delivery driver was rude and didn’t follow instructions. This is not how you treat customers.  
I tried to cancel my subscription, but it was a nightmare. They made it so difficult.  
The product did not match the description at all. I feel like I’ve been misled.  
I waited an hour for my meal, and it came out wrong. This is unacceptable service.  
The app is full of glitches, making it frustrating to use. I expected better.  
I was disappointed with the lack of variety in the menu. It felt very limited.  
The staff seemed overwhelmed and unable to assist properly during my visit.  
I had an awful experience with my flight being canceled at the last minute.  
The quality of the fabric is poor; it started to fray after one wash.  
I wish the staff had been more attentive. It felt like we were invisible.  
The hotel room wasn’t clean upon arrival, which was very disappointing.  
The online ordering system is confusing and led to my order being incorrect.  
I felt the advertisement for the product was misleading. It didn’t live up to the hype.  
The service was slow, and the server forgot our order. Not impressed at all.  
I faced constant errors while trying to use the online platform. It’s very frustrating.  
The staff at the store were unhelpful, and I left without making a purchase.  
The trip was not worth the money; the itinerary was poorly planned.  
I didn’t receive the customer service I expected when I reported an issue.  
I was disappointed with how dirty the restaurant was. It’s a big turn-off.  
The quality of this subscription box has declined significantly over the months.  
I was looking forward to the event, but it was poorly organized and chaotic.  
The product broke after just one use. I expected it to last longer.  
I had to wait too long for my food, and when it arrived, it was cold.  
The app constantly crashes, making it impossible to use effectively.  
I wasn’t pleased with the lack of options for dietary restrictions at the restaurant.  
The customer service rep didn’t seem knowledgeable about the issue I called about.
